link:labelLink.link:label: Represents information pertaining to amount of accumulated fund as at the reporting date.
Represents information pertaining to accumulated funds (deficit).
Represents the amount of allowance for doubtful debts to reconcile profit (loss) to net cash flow from (used in) operating activities.
Represents the amount of amortisation of government grants to reconcile profit (loss) to net cash flow from (used in) operating activities.
Report the value, for the reporting period, of adjustments for increase (decrease) in property development costs to reconcile profit (loss) to net cash flow from (used in) operating activities.
Represents information pertaining to adjustments for decrease (increase) in property, plant and equipment written off.
Represents the amount of gain (loss) on disposal of investment property to reconcile profit (loss) to net cash flow from (used in) operating activities.
Report the value, for the reporting period, of other non-current assets not reported elsewhere in the statement to reconcile profit (loss) to net cash flow from (used in) operating activities.

Report the value, for the reporting period, of adjustments for performance-based employee share scheme and other expenses to reconcile profit (loss) to net cash flow from (used in) operating activities. Share-based payment arrangement is an agreement between the entity (or another group entity or any shareholder of any group entity) and another party (including an employee) that entitles the other party to receive

Report the value, for the reporting period, of adjustments for share of joint ventures post-tax profit to reconcile profit (loss) to net cash flow from (used in) operating activities. A joint venture is a joint arrangement whereby the parties that have joint control of the arrangement have rights to the net assets of the arrangement.

Report the value, for the reporting period, of adjustments for share option expenses to reconcile profit (loss) to net cash flow from (used in) operating activities. Share-based payment arrangement is an agreement between the entity (or another group entity or any shareholder of any group entity) and another party (including an employee) that entitles the other party to receive
Represents the amount of unrealised foreign exchange gain (loss) to reconcile profit (loss) to net cash flow from (used in) operating activities.
Represents the amount of expenses related to agent fees.
Report the value, as at the reporting date, the sum of shares outstanding at the beginning of the period.
Represents the amount of expenses related to assessment and quit rent.

Report the value, as at the reporting date, the aggregate of group of assets to be disposed of, by sale or otherwise, together as a group in a single transaction, and liabilities directly associated with those assets that will be transferred in the transaction. The group includes goodwill acquired in a business combination if the group is a cash-generating unit to which goodwill has been allocated or if it is an operation within such a cash-generating unit.
Represents information pertaining to assets other than assets held for sale.
Represents the amount of cash at bank held outside country by the entity.
Represents the amount of cash at bank locally held by the entity.
Report the value, for the reporting period, of cash payments in relation to expense incurred from the issuance of perpetual sukuk.
Represents information pertaining to changes in fund during the reporting period.
Represents the amount of expenses related to foreign charitable grants.
Represents the amount of expenses related to local charitable grants.
Represents information pertaining to components of fund.
Represents information pertaining to type of components of fund.
Represents the amount of property, plant and equipment representing computer software and hardware held by the entity for use in operations.
Report the value, as at the reporting date, the aggregate of the difference between the cost of acquisition and the nominal value of the share capital and reserves acquired.
This member stands for a component of equity representing the difference between the cost of acquisition and the nominal value of the share capital and reserves acquired.
Report the value, for the reporting period, the consolidation adjustments.
Represents the amount of contribution from government classified as financing activities.
Represents information pertaining to contributions by and distributions to owners during the reporting period.
Represents the amount of contributions from members as of reporting period.

Report the value, as at the reporting date, the aggregate of contributions to subsidiaries which are amounts that entity does not expect repayment in the foreseeable future and are considered as part of the entity’s investment in the subsidiaries.
Report the value, as at the reporting date, the sum of current derivatives at fair value through profit or loss.

Report the value, as at the reporting date, the aggregate current portion of informal agreements traded through a broker-dealer network to buy and sell derivative instruments, typically currency, at a specified price at a certain future date that are classified at fair value through profit or loss.

Report the value, as at the reporting date, the aggregate current portion of rights to buy or sell derivative instruments at a specified price within a set time that are classified at fair value through profit or loss.
Report the value, as at the reporting date, the aggregate of other current derivatives financial assets not reported elsewhere in the categories above.

Report the value, as at the reporting date, the aggregate current portion of exchange of assets between two borrowers, either so that each acquires access to funds in a currency they need or so that a fixed interest rate is exchanged for a floating rate that are classified at fair value through profit or loss.
Report the value, as at the reporting date, the sum of current derivatives at fair value through profit or loss.

Report the value, as at the reporting date, the aggregate current portion of informal agreements traded through a broker-dealer network to buy and sell derivative instruments typically currency, at a specified price at a certain future date that are classified at fair value through profit or loss.

Report the value, as at the reporting date, the aggregate current portion of informal agreements traded through a broker-dealer network to buy and sell derivative instruments typically currency, at a specified price at a certain future date used for hedging.

Report the value, as at the reporting date, the aggregate current portion of rights to buy or sell derivative instruments at a specified price within a set time that are classified at fair value through profit or loss.
Report the value, as at the reporting date, the aggregate current portion of rights to buy or sell derivative instruments at a specified price within a set time used for hedging.
Report the value, as at the reporting date, the aggregate current portion of other derivatives at fair value through profit or loss not reported elsewhere in the categories above.
Report the value, as at the reporting date, the aggregate of other derivatives used for hedging not reported elsewhere in the categories above.

Report the value, as at the reporting date, the aggregate current portion of exchange of liabilities between two borrowers, either so that each acquires access to funds in a currency they need or so that a fixed interest rate is exchanged for a floating rate that are classified at fair value through profit or loss.

Report the value, as at the reporting date, the aggregate current portion of exchange of liabilities between two borrowers, either so that each acquires access to funds in a currency they need or so that a fixed interest rate is exchanged for a floating rate used for hedging.
Report the value, as at the reporting date, the sum of current derivatives used for hedging.
Represents the amount of current non-trade deposits and advanced billings.
Represents the amount of current non-trade dividend payables.
Report the value, as at the reporting date, the aggregate current portion of borrowing costs which refers to interest and other costs that an entity incurs in connection with the borrowing of funds.
Represents the amount of current non-trade interest payables.
Report the value, as at the reporting date, the aggregate current portion of other derivatives at fair value through profit or loss not reported elsewhere in the categories above.
Report the value, as at the reporting date, the aggregate current portion of secured bills of exchange drawn on and accepted by a bank in Malaysia.
Report the value, as at the reporting date, the aggregate current portion of secured hire purchase and finance lease liabilities.
Report the value, as at the reporting date, the aggregate current portion of secured Islamic financing facilities.
Represents the amount of current portion of non-current secured islamic medium term notes.
Represents the amount of current portion of non-current secured revolvig credit and notes.

Report the value, as at the reporting date, the aggregate current portion of secured sukuk which are certificates of equal value which evidence undivided ownership or investment in the assets using Shariah principles and concepts endorsed by the Shariah Committee.

Report the value, as at the reporting date, the aggregate current portion of secured loan from a bank for a specific amount that has a specified repayment schedule and a fixed or floating interest rate.
Report the value, as at the reporting date, the aggregate current portion of secured trade financing facilities.
Report the value, as at the reporting date, the aggregate current portion of unsecured block discounting payables.
Report the value, as at the reporting date, the aggregate current portion of unsecured hire purchase and finance lease liabilities.
Report the value, as at the reporting date, the aggregate current portion of unsecured Irredeemable Convertible Unsecured Loan Stocks (ICULS).
Report the value, as at the reporting date, the aggregate current portion of unsecured Islamic financing facilities.
Represents the amount of current portion of non-current unsecured islamic medium term notes.
Represents the amount of current portion of non-current unsecured revolvig credit and notes.

Report the value, as at the reporting date, the aggregate current portion of unsecured sukuk which are certificates of equal value which evidence undivided ownership or investment in the assets using Shariah principles and concepts endorsed by the Shariah Committee.

Report the value, as at the reporting date, the aggregate current portion of unsecured term loan from a bank for a specific amount that has a specified repayment schedule and a fixed or floating interest rate.
Report the value, as at the reporting date, the aggregate current portion of secured bonds.
Represents the amount of current portion of secured bonds, sukuk and loan stock.
Report the value, as at the reporting date, the aggregate current portion of secured loan stocks.
Report the value, as at the reporting date, the aggregate current portion of secured medium term notes.

Report the value, as at the reporting date, the aggregate current portion of secured shares by whatever name called, which does not entitle the holder thereof to the right to vote at a general meeting or to any right to participate beyond a specified amount in any distribution whether by way of dividend, or on redemption, in a winding up.

Report the value, as at the reporting date, the aggregate current portion of secured sukuk which are certificates of equal value which evidence undivided ownership or investment in the assets using Shariah principles and concepts endorsed by the Shariah Committee.
Report the value, as at the reporting date, the aggregate current portion of unsecured bonds.
Represents the amount of current portion of unsecured bonds, sukuk and loan stock.
Report the value, as at the reporting date, the aggregate current portion of unsecured loan stocks.
Report the value, as at the reporting date, the aggregate current portion of unsecured medium term notes.

Report the value, as at the reporting date, the aggregate current portion of unsecured shares by whatever name called, which does not entitle the holder thereof to the right to vote at a general meeting or to any right to participate beyond a specified amount in any distribution whether by way of dividend, or on redemption, in a winding up.

Report the value, as at the reporting date, the aggregate current portion of unsecured sukuk which are certificates of equal value which evidence undivided ownership or investment in the assets using Shariah principles and concepts endorsed by the Shariah Committee.

Report the value, as at the reporting date, the aggregate current portion of post-employment benefit plans are formal or informal arrangements under which an entity provides post-employment benefits for one or more employees.
Represents information pertaining to customer relationships.
Report the value, for the reporting period, of cash flows of deposit placements with investment brokers which shall be presented separately and classified as investing activities.
Represents information pertaining to depreciation, impairment and amortisation during the reporting period.
Report the value, as at the reporting date, the sum of derivatives at fair value through profit or loss.

Report the value, as at the reporting date, the aggregate of informal agreements traded through a broker-dealer network to buy and sell derivative instruments, typically currency, at a specified price at a certain future date that are classified at fair value through profit or loss.

Report the value, as at the reporting date, the aggregate of rights to buy or sell derivative instruments at a specified price within a set time that are classified at fair value through profit or loss.
Report the value, as at the reporting date, the aggregate of other derivatives at fair value through profit or loss not reported elsewhere in the categories above.

Report the value, as at the reporting date, the aggregate of exchange of liabilities between two borrowers, either so that each acquires access to funds in a currency they need or so that a fixed interest rate is exchanged for a floating rate that are classified at fair value through profit or loss.
Report the value, as at the reporting date, the sum of derivatives at fair value through profit or loss.

Report the value, as at the reporting date, the aggregate amount of informal agreements traded through a broker-dealer network to buy and sell derivative instruments typically currency, at a specified price at a certain future date that are classified at fair value through profit or loss.

Report the value, as at the reporting date, the aggregate amount of informal agreements traded through a broker-dealer network to buy and sell derivative instruments typically currency, at a specified price at a certain future date used for hedging.

Report the value, as at the reporting date, the aggregate amount of rights to buy or sell derivative instruments at a specified price within a set time that are classified at fair value through profit or loss.

Report the value, as at the reporting date, the aggregate amount of other derivatives liabilities at fair value through profit or loss not reported elsewhere in the categories above.
Report the value, as at the reporting date, the aggregate amount of other derivatives liabilities used for hedging not reported elsewhere in the categories above.

Report the value, as at the reporting date, the aggregate amount of exchange of liabilities between two borrowers, either so that each acquires access to funds in a currency they need or so that a fixed interest rate is exchanged for a floating rate that are classified at fair value through profit or loss.
Report the value, as at the reporting date, the sum of derivatives used for hedging.

Report the value, as at the reporting date, the aggregate amount of exchange of liabilities between two borrowers, either so that each acquires access to funds in a currency they need or so that a fixed interest rate is exchanged for a floating rate used for hedging.

Report the value, as at the reporting date, the sum of distributable other reserves.
Report the value, as at the reporting date, the aggregate of dividend payable to non-controlling interests.

Report the value, for the reporting period, of cash receipts from dividends which are distributions of profits to holders of equity investments in proportion to their holdings of a particular class of capital which shall be presented separately and classified as financing activities.
Represents the amount of donations received by foreign contributor.
Represents the amount of donations received by local contributor.
Represents the amount of donations received by unknown contributor.
Represents the amount of expenses related to entertainment.
Represents information pertaining to amount of expenditure incurred during the reporting date.

Report the value, for the reporting period, of the difference, if any, between the carrying amount of the assets distributed and the carrying amount of the dividend payable in profit or loss when entities settle the dividend payable.
Represents information pertaining to fair value adjustment reserve.
Report the value, as at the reporting date, the aggregate of fair value reserves.
Represents information pertaining to amount of fund and liabilities as at the reporting date.
Represents information pertaining to amount of fund and reserve as at the reporting date.
Represents the amount of fund and reserves attributable to owners as of reporting period.
Represents information pertaining to fund balance as at the reporting period.
Represents information pertaining to restated balance of fund after impact of changes in accounting standards and other prior period adjustments as at the reporting period.
Represents information pertaining to funds and reserves attributable to owners.
Represents information pertaining to funds and reserves.
Report the value, for the reporting period, of (gain) loss on disposal of associates to reconcile profit (loss) to net cash flow from (used in) operating activities.
Report the value, for the reporting period, of (gain) loss on disposal of joint ventures to reconcile profit (loss) to net cash flow from (used in) operating activities.
Report the value, for the reporting period, of (gain) loss on disposal of subsidiaries to reconcile profit (loss) to net cash flow from (used in) operating activities.
Represents the amount of government contribution received by the entity.
Represents the amount of grant received from government research classified as investing activities.
Represents information pertaining to growing canes biological assets.
Represents the amount of expenses related to handling and custody fees.
Represents information pertaining to amount of head office account as at the reporting date.
Report the value, as at the reporting date, the aggregate of head office accounts.

Report the value, for the reporting period, of adjustments for impairment loss (reversal of impairment loss) on investment in subsidiaries recognised in profit or loss to reconcile profit (loss) to net cash flow from (used in) operating activities.

Report the value, for the reporting period, of adjustments for impairment loss (reversal of impairment loss) on investment in associates recognised in profit or loss to reconcile profit (loss) to net cash flow from (used in) operating activities.

Report the value, for the reporting period, of adjustments for impairment loss (reversal of impairment loss) on investment in joint ventures recognised in profit or loss to reconcile profit (loss) to net cash flow from (used in) operating activities.

Report the value, for the reporting period, of adjustments for impairment loss (reversal of impairment loss) on prepaid lease rentals recognised in profit or loss to reconcile profit (loss) to net cash flow from (used in) operating activities.

Report the value, for the reporting period, of adjustments for impairment loss (reversal of impairment loss) on investment in other investments not reported elsewhere in the statement recognised in profit or loss to reconcile profit (loss) to net cash flow from (used in) operating activities.
Represents information pertaining to amount of income received during the reporting date.

Represents the amount of income from donations during the reporting period.

Represents the amount of income received from grants or incentive.

Represents the amount of property, plant and equipment representing infrastructure and site facilities used in the entity's operations.
Represents the amount of interest income from trust account.

Report the value, for the reporting period, of cash receipts from interest which are charges for the use of cash or cash equivalents or amounts due to the entity which shall be presented separately and classified as financing activities.
Report the value, as at the reporting date, the aggregate of investments in associates related to fair value adjustments on shareholder’s loans and advances.

Report the value, as at the reporting date, the aggregate of investments in associates, net of impairment not quoted or listed on a stock exchange outside Malaysia.

Report the value, as at the reporting date, the aggregate of investments in joint ventures, net of impairment not quoted or listed on a stock exchange outside Malaysia.

Report the value, as at the reporting date, the aggregate of investments in subsidiaries of other quoted financial assets outside Malaysia not reported elsewhere in the categories above.

Report the value, as at the reporting date, the aggregate non-current portion of goods or services acquired and the liability incurred at the fair value of the liability. Until the liability is settled, the entity shall remeasure the fair value of the liability at the end of each reporting period and at the date of settlement, with any changes in fair value recognized in profit or loss for the period.
Report the value, as at the reporting date, the aggregate non-current portion of post-employment benefit plans other than defined contribution plans.

Report the value, as at the reporting date, the aggregate non-current portion of post-employment benefit plans under which an entity pays fixed contributions into a separate entity (a fund) and will have no legal or constructive obligation to pay further contributions if the fund does not hold sufficient assets to pay all employee benefits relating to employee service in the current and prior periods.

Report the value, for the reporting period, of realised foreign currencies exchange gain transferred from equity to reconcile profit (loss) to net cash flow from (used in) operating activities. Exchange differences arising on a monetary item that forms part of a reporting entity’s net investment in a foreign operation shall be recognised in profit or loss in the separate financial statements of the reporting entity or the individual financial statements of the foreign operation, as appropriate.

Represents information pertaining to reversal attributable to disposal group classified as held for sale during the reporting period.

Report the value, for the reporting period, of the reversal of impairment loss in land held for development. If, in a subsequent period, the amount of impairment loss decreases and the decrease can be related objectively to an event occurring after the impairment was recognized (such as an improvement in the debtor’s credit rating), the previously recognized impairment loss shall be reversed either directly or by adjusting an allowance account. The reversal shall not result in a carrying amount of the financial asset that exceeds what the amortized cost would have been had the impairment not been recognized at the date the impairment is reversed. The amount of the loss shall be recognized in profit or loss.

Represents the amount of leasehold land assets that represent a lessee's right to use an underlying asset for the lease term. Underlying asset is an asset that is the subject of a lease, for which the right to use that asset has been provided by a lessor to a lessee.

Represents the amount of prepaid land lease assets that represent a lessee's right to use an underlying asset for the lease term. Underlying asset is an asset that is the subject of a lease, for which the right to use that asset has been provided by a lessor to a lessee.

Represents the amount of prepaid rental for building and facilities assets that represent a lessee's right to use an underlying asset for the lease term. Underlying asset is an asset that is the subject of a lease, for which the right to use that asset has been provided by a lessor to a lessee.

Report the value, as at the reporting date, the aggregate of infrastructure items to which the operator is given access by the grantor for the purposes of the service arrangement are not recognized as property, plant and equipment of the operator. The grantor may also provide other items to the operator that the operator can keep or deal with as it wishes. If such assets form part of the consideration payable by the grantor for the services, they are not government grants as defined in MFRS 120. They are recognized as assets of the operator, measured at fair value on initial recognition.

Report the value, as at the reporting date, the aggregate of infrastructure items to which the operator is given access by the grantor for the purposes of service arrangement are not recognized as property, plant and equipment of the operator. The grantor may also provide other items to the operator that the operator can keep or deal with as it wishes. If such assets form part of the consideration payable by the grantor for the services, they are not government grants. They are recognized as assets of the operator, measured at fair value on initial recognition. The operator shall recognize a liability in respect of unfulfilled obligations it has assumed in exchange for the assets.

Report the value, for the reporting period, of bank deposits withdrawn or placed which shall be presented separately and classified as financing activities.

Report the value, for the reporting period, of fuel expenses written back after being charged. Fuel costs are costs of any substance burned as a source of heat or power.
Represents the amount of write-down of trade and other receivables to reconcile profit (loss) to net cash flow from (used in) operating activities.
Report the value, for the reporting period, of the sum assets written off.

Report the value, for the reporting period, of write offs of intangible assets which are identifiable non-monetary assets without physical substance, to reconcile profit (loss) to net cash flow from (used in) operating activities.

Report the value, for the reporting period, of investments written off to reconcile profit (loss) to net cash flow from (used in) operating activities. An interest in another entity refers to contractual and non-contractual involvement that exposes an entity to variability of returns from the performance of the other entity. An interest in another entity can be evidenced by, but is not limited to, the holding of equity or debt instruments as well as other forms of involvement such as the provision of funding, liquidity support, credit enhancement and guarantees.

Report the value, for the reporting period, of other financial assets written off not reported elsewhere in the statement. An entity shall directly reduce the gross carrying amount of a financial asset when the entity has no reasonable expectations of recovering a financial asset in its entirety or a portion thereof.
